Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1968...
Injured on 7/22/1969 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/1/1970 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/21/1971 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/8/1972, off Rudy Simas (CBC)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/25/1972, off Sam Malone (WIS)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Manchester on 5/5/1975...
Injured on 5/12/1977 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/7/1978 to a 4-year deal worth $2,251,212 per year...
Traded from Pontiac to West Texas on 2/5/1979 (Going to WT: SS J. Hazzard. Going to PON: 1B J. Zollinger, P N. Wilson)...
